name: Mic Drop (JamieOutram)
description:
You've all lost your main form of communication, can you find another way?

Grab some friends and get together in a video call. Once you start the game there's no talking to the player allowed, you can only communicate answers visually. Discussing answers directly is off the cards, its a game of charades but with a twist. Complete as many minigames as you can before time runs out! There's extra points for being fast but watch out, if you answer incorrectly you'll take a time penalty.  Can you reach 3 Stars? 

The game features 6 different minigames, for each game a player is selected at random (or everybody is a player). Gain score and time by answering quickly and correctly. 

Created by

JamieOutram

HorjeCazador

KRyder
